NBL-CNB: Address Matching Process
===================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :hidden:
   address_matching/data_prep

This document gives an overview on the address matching process. Each step of the process is outlined and examples are given

.. Warning::

   This project is under active development and as such this documentation is liable to change at any time

The matching process is divided up into several distinct phases outlined in the pages below

.. container:: button
   :doc:`Data Preparation <address_matching/data_prep>`
